name: Chilie
description: What is Chilie? A funny brain training video game, and also the name of the main character!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: P4 2Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 2600 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4600+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 9800 GTX / ATI Radeon HD 4870 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
